title.content: On Page SEO Checker – Free Tool for On-Page Analysis | Semrush

metaDescription.content: On Page SEO Checker provides detailed analysis to determine whether pages are optimized and whether there are some SEO errors. Bring out the best in your webpages with on-point On Page SEO Checker.

content.html:
1. Features

  2. On Page SEO Checker

On Page SEO Checker

Collect fresh ideas and website SEO analysis from our data-powered on-page SEO tool.

Get Your SEO Ideas

How On Page SEO Checker
Can Help Improve Your Rank

Pinpoint your website’s weaknesses with the help of our On Page SEO Checker. By taking data from Semrush and Google, this analysis tool provides actionable steps to improve your rankings on Google by comparing your page with the top 10 real-time organic competitors for each target keyword.
St

Strategy ideas

Find out which pages of your website perform the best, and optimize their on-page SEO for target keywords. The checker analyzes your website’s landing pages and suggests already high-ranking pages you can optimize for particular keywords.

Ba

Backlink ideas

Discover new sources for link building and strengthening your search rankings. These ideas will help you build an outreach list and build backlinks from highly-trusted websites.

Te

Technical SEO ideas

You should be aware of technical issues affecting your website’s search positions. These ideas from On Page SEO Checker integrate data from Semrush’s Site Audit tool and show you the technical site issues your website may have.

Se

Semantic ideas

The SEO checker’s semantic ideas help you enrich your website content with more keywords and topics that are related to your main target keyword. By covering more related topics, your content will be more helpful to more people, which could lead to higher Google rankings.

Co

Content ideas

We analyze the content of your top competitors on Google and provide you with guidance on what you need to do with your content to beat them. Understand when your content is overstuffed with keywords, how readable it is, and when it’s not as informative as it should be.

Ux

User experience ideas

See how your webpage is perceived by your audience. This page checker tool analyzes data taken from Google Analytics and gives you a picture of your web page’s UX state to help you find out what you need to fix in order to bring it to higher search positions.

Sf

SERP Features Ideas

Learn how to get your website showcased in one of Google’s SERP Features. The tool looks through data based on your top 10 rivals in Google, analyzes the keywords triggering SERP features, and makes recommendations for you so you can implement the advice straight away.

Get Your SEO Ideas

How to Use On Page SEO Checker

  1. Enter your landing pages and keywords
  2. Set up the crawler
  3. Schedule your emails to start receiving new ideas
  4. Integrate data from Google Analytics, Google Search Console, and Semrush’s Site Audit
  5. Get a complete and structured list of things you can do to improve your rankings for certain pages of your website

Analyze the factors affecting your website’s performance

Make sure your site complies with all important off-page & on-page SEO elements such as content, backlinks, page titles, and more.

Get actionable recommendations based on data

In minutes, you’ll have your personalized list of recommendations along with an explanation of where each idea comes from and why it matters for SEO.

Review an in-depth analysis of your top competitors

Dive deeper into comparisons between your pages and each competitor with the Detailed Analysis report.

Get your SEO ideas today and build your site with great content

Get Started

Get Started
